goals.title: Technical Workshops
goals.description: Regular fortnightly educational sessions covering diverse topics including hands-on coding bootcamps, personal branding strategies for tech professionals, emerging FinTech innovations, and cutting-edge Machine Learning with Computer Vision applications

goals.title: Mentorship & Talks
goals.description: Monthly speaker series featuring accomplished women leaders from various tech industries who share their journey, provide career guidance, and offer valuable networking opportunities to inspire the next generation

goals.title: Flagship Events
goals.description: Bi-annual large-scale events designed to raise campus-wide awareness about gender diversity challenges, showcase women's achievements in STEM fields, and actively work toward improving gender representation in technology sectors

goals.title: Community Building
goals.description: Fostering an inclusive environment that encourages greater participation of women students at Plaksha University in technology initiatives, research projects, and building stronger connections within the broader tech community
